input_data.title: Traces
input_data.overview: Set against the stunning Scottish landscape in and around Dundee, three compelling female characters — Emma Hedges, Prof. Sarah Gordon and Prof. Kathy Torrance — join forces to uncover the truth about an unsolved murder case that's very close to home.

response.analytical_summary: Traces is a British crime drama series set in Scotland, focusing on three women who collaborate to reinvestigate a cold case with personal connections. The series blends elements of mystery, procedural investigation, and character-driven drama, exploring themes of grief, family secrets, and the pursuit of justice. The stunning Scottish landscape serves as a backdrop, enhancing the atmosphere of intrigue and emotional depth. The show offers a suspenseful and emotionally resonant viewing experience, appealing to fans of crime dramas with a focus on character development and atmospheric storytelling.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with the discovery of a decades-old cassette tape containing a chilling message related to the disappearance of a young man, Daniel Baillie. Emma Hedges, a young woman obsessed with the case, enlists the help of two former colleagues, Professor Sarah Gordon and Professor Kathy Torrance, to re-examine the evidence. As they delve deeper, they uncover a web of secrets and lies within the small Scottish community, revealing that the original investigation was flawed and potentially covered up. The women face resistance from local authorities and individuals who have a vested interest in keeping the truth buried. They uncover connections between the original case and a series of other unsolved mysteries, suggesting a pattern of wrongdoing. The investigation forces Emma, Sarah, and Kathy to confront their own personal demons and past traumas, while also putting them in danger as they get closer to exposing the truth about what happened to Daniel Baillie and the events surrounding his disappearance. The series culminates in the exposure of the individuals responsible for the cover-up, bringing a measure of closure to the families affected by the tragedy.
response.keyword_sentence: Set against the atmospheric Scottish landscape, Traces is a suspenseful crime drama that explores themes of grief and justice as three women investigate a decades-old cold case and uncover a web of family secrets.
